prompt_guide.core_structure: simple circular logo, sleek and modern, CMU colors, motto on the border, Scotty mascot on the border, with a fully transparent center

material_properties.surfaces: sleek, smooth, no scratches or imperfections

composition_controls.subject_placement: simple circular design, the center is fully transparent, the circular border touches all four boundaries of the square frame, no additional whitespace between the frame and the border

visual_elements.description: A simple, sleek circular border with a fully transparent center. The border should expand to the full size of the 1:1 canvas, touching its edges.
Utilize CMU's official colors: Carnegie Red (#C41230), Black (#000000), Steel Gray (#E0E0E0), and Gray (#6D6E71).
A stylized, minimalist representation of the Scotty mascot placed on the circular border, on the top half.
The motto 'My heart is in the work' should be incorporated in a clean, modern font, placed on the circular border, following the curve of the shape on the bottom half.
